text: This week the CDC quietly updated the COVID-19 number to admit that only 6% of all the 153,504 deaths recorded actually died from (only) COVID-19. That's 9,210 deaths. The other 94% had 2-3 other serious illnesses & the overwhelming majority were of advanced age.

Is this true??

The #CDC quietly updated the #Covid number to admit that only 6% of all the 153,504 deaths recorded actually died from #COVID-19 .  

153,504 x .06  = 9,210 deaths.  

Is this #True?!?
